snippet: The Toronto Raptors erased a 10-point deficit to defeat the Nets, who were riding a five-game winning streak and coming off an impressive victory over Miami.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Toronto Raptors end Brooklyn Nets' five-game winning streak with 96-80 victory; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Raptors erased a 10-point deficit to defeat the Nets, who were riding a five-game winning streak and coming off an impressive victory over Miami.

headline.main: Nets Falter in Third Quarter; Streak Ends at 5 Games
headline.print_headline: Nets Falter In Third; Streak Ends At 5 Games
